Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0684 affecting package coreutils for versions less than 9.4-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0684 affecting package coreutils for versions less than 9.4-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package coreutils is earlier than 9.4-5, affected by CVE-2024-0684
